html:
LIGHT SHED BY IGUZZINI

Combining acoustic absorption, decorative furnishing, sustainable materials and smart, human-centric lighting, the Light Shed line by iGuzzini has been specifically developed to match spatial and design trends for working, retail, hospitality and infrastructure environments. The minimal design of the product shifts visually from two-dimensionality to three-dimensionality, breaking the monotony of the ceiling line while creating a dynamic, inviting atmosphere with a focus on visual comfort and well-being.


iGuzzini designs the Light Shed family specifically for work and commercial spaces | all images courtesy of iGuzzini

ALL-IN-ONE LIGHTING SOLUTION MADE FROM 85% RECYCLED MATERIALS

Designed with advanced technical capabilities, the Light Shed features high-efficiency LEDs and can be managed through a DALI system (Digital Addressable Lighting Interface), which optimizes energy use by activating only when needed. Made from up to 85% recycled materials and fully recyclable, its eco-friendly design aligns with the Italian brand’s goal of reducing environmental impact throughout the product’s lifecycle. With its focus on performance, sustainability, and well-being, Light Shed offers a versatile, all-in-one solution for a variety of spaces.


acoustic absorption, decorative furnishing, and sustainable materials combined in a smart lighting solution

A DECORATIVE LIGHT WITH SMART MANAGEMENT

Equipped with a microprismatic optic, Light Shed delivers powerful, but comfortable illumination, with customizable color temperatures (3000K, 4000K, or Tunable White) and high color accuracy. The 60 dB model also acts as a sound-absorbing panel, reducing ambient noise and creating a calm environment. The product is available in a square format and three different sizes (120 cm, 60 cm and 30 cm), in recessed or pendant versions and in a range of colors (white, grey, green and blue). A special touch can be given by personalized ad hoc images or finishes, while smart accessories like sensors and cameras offer added functionality for safety, comfort, and space management.


the high-efficiency LEDs and can be managed through a DALI system, optimizing energy use

In addition to the 60 dB lighting solution, Light Shed Linen introduces an even more sustainable and lighter variant made from a durable linen fiber composite. Designed to combine natural and artificial elements, it embraces biophilic design principles, creating environments that promote well-being and creativity. By reducing its carbon and water footprint, the use of linen fiber adds a natural aesthetic and enhances the product’s circularity. Equipped with a Tunable White system and built-in sensors, Light Shed Linen automatically optimizes the balance between natural and artificial light, ensuring visual comfort while fostering a sense of calmness.
